segments.text: Yes . I am interested in applying for graduate school in America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have some catalogues from U . S . universities . You may check in the reference stacks over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you recommend some universities with good graduate schools ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , generally in the U . S . each university has its own outstanding fields . But the graduate school accepts no applications after January 29th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you have to apply to begin the first semester next year .
segments.speaker: S1
